parameters.name: title
parameters.description: File name without extension, or with .docx. The .docx extension is normalized.

parameters.name: text_content
parameters.description: Optional text content to include in the new document. If omitted, an empty document is created.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: Optional parent folder ID. If omitted, the document is created in the root.

parameters.name: conflict_behavior
parameters.description: Optional conflict behavior when a file with the same name exists. One of: fail, rename, replace.

documentationChunks.content:
## Overview

Arcade.dev LLM tools for Microsoft Word enable automated creation, retrieval, and modification of .docx documents stored in a user's OneDrive, plus querying the current user/environment.

**Capabilities**
- Create new .docx documents in OneDrive (4MB upload limit).
- Retrieve document metadata and content (returns content as Markdown by default; supports only .docx).
- Append text to the end of a .docx document (4MB upload limit).
- Get information about the current user and Microsoft Word environment.

**OAuth**
Provider: microsoft

Scopes:
- Files.Read
- Files.ReadWrite
- User.Read

summary:
Arcade.dev Microsoft Word toolkit enables LLMs to interact with Microsoft Word files stored in OneDrive, letting apps create, read, and append .docx documents and query user context. It supports document creation (4MB upload limit), content retrieval as Markdown or metadata-only, and appending text.

**Capabilities**
- Create and update .docx documents with size-aware uploads and optional initial content.
- Retrieve document content converted to Markdown or fetch metadata-only for lightweight operations.
- Append plain text to existing documents while preserving structure and file format.
- Access authenticated user and environment context for personalization and access checks.

**OAuth**
Provider: microsoft
Scopes: Files.Read, Files.ReadWrite, User.Read
